title: Is there a way to see reports against yourself?
body:
As title says, is there any way to see how many times you have been reported and what for?
Not wanting the names, dates or what they said (if they wrote a message), just curious about the numbers for things like verbal abuse, feeding, afking etc.

replies.body:
I've always had pretty prompt replies from Support..
Maybe I'm lucky. Who knows.

Either way, I'm fairly certain this is not something that you can do without personally asking Support if they can supply that info, even then that is a long shot.

pretty sure no


ask support to be sure
if they even read it 
{{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}}
Haha we both know support never reply to tickets.
WHy does it matter? You shouldnt be getting reported anyway. If you are toxic, you should know yourself, FIX IT
